channel.title: Sponsorship help
channel.description:
Hello,
So I decided to put up my server on the sponsored list, I paid the 5$ entry fee. What now? How do I place my bid :l ?
Thanks in advance, Vichy.

item.title: Sponsorship help
item.dc:creator: @silabgarza silabgarza
item.description:
@silabgarza wrote:

hadesflames:

Or, you can be an idiot like everyone else, bid starting today which will make the overall cost in the end greater for us, and still end up not getting a spot.

:’(
but this is true, people shouldn’t have bidding wars until the last minute

Read full topic

item.title: Sponsorship help
item.dc:creator: @hadesflames hadesflames
item.description:
@hadesflames wrote:

Don’t bid until the 9th. All bidding does before then is jack up the cost. On the 9th, towards the end of the day, you can bid here:

http://www.moparisthebest.com/sponsbid.php

Or, you can be an idiot like everyone else, bid starting today which will make the overall cost in the end greater for us, and still end up not getting a spot. Usually people that bid around the start and don’t rebid later on (around the 8th and 9th) don’t get a spot at all. So, if you’re going to have to bid around then anyway, might as well do us all a favor and not bid at all UNTIL then. I just don’t understand why people don’t get this =/

Read full topic
